body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44497

#### PR description:
The PR updates the 2024 geometry and compatible GEM alignment conditions tags in the relevant MC GTs:
- `140X_mcRun3_2024_design_v6`
- `140X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v7`
- `140X_mcRun3_2024cosmics_realistic_deco_v7`
- `140X_mcRun3_2024cosmics_design_deco_v5`

More details with the full list of tag updates and links to relevant presentations can be found in the CMS Talk request in [1]. 

[1] https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/gt-mc-data-update-of-2024-gem-and-rpc-geomtery-conditions-for-data-and-mc/36739

**GT Differences with the last ones are here**:

- **Phase1 2024 design**: 
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/140X_mcRun3_2024_design_v3/140X_mcRun3_2024_design_v6

- **Phase1 2024 realistic**: 
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/140X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v4/140X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v7

- **Phase1 2024 cosmics realistic**:
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/140X_mcRun3_2024cosmics_realistic_deco_v4/140X_mcRun3_2024cosmics_realistic_deco_v7

- **Phase1 2024 cosmics design**: 
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/140X_mcRun3_2024cosmics_design_deco_v2/140X_mcRun3_2024cosmics_design_deco_v5
